script:
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background %(background)s
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
@
教会にやってきた
マスターとアスカロン

# textflame 1 1
@%(unitName:unit_a)s
わぁ…
すっごく神秘的…

# textflame 1 1
@%(unitName:unit_a)s
ねぇ、マスター…

# textflame 1 1
@%(unitName:unit_a)s
マスターは夜の教会って
どう思いますか？

# select "すごく綺麗…" "select_label_01" "すごく神秘的だと思う" "select_label_02" "なんだか新鮮だね" "select_label_03"
マスターは夜の教会って
どう思いますか？

# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
